structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Plans -- Contracts -- Surveys -- Maps -- Right of access.

text.section: The members of the authority, or its agents and employees, after reasonable notice to the occupants, owners, or owners' agent in charge thereof, may enter upon such lands and structures for the purpose of making surveys and maps.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 237, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 927a-4, 2741x-4.
